creator: Sutty5
title: What Is PWM?
description: This project provides an introduction to Pulse Width Modulation (PWM) and its basic principles. It encourages users to explore and understand PWM through practical application.
steps: The provided text is an introduction to PWM by Sutty5 from Simply Electronics.
The introduction encourages users to explore the world of electronics and learn about PWM.
The reader is directed to Simply Electronics' YouTube channel for more information and demonstrations.
Users are encouraged to try a circuit related to PWM to gain practical experience.
